name: Slime Zone
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 50 Compo (Delay the Inevitable): https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/slime-zone

Slime Zone is a survival platformer. You control a slime being chased by a mysterious black hole infinitely spewing blocks into a laboratory.

In order to survive, you must work your way around the lab, tactically destroying blocks in your way with your spit and jumping between walls to escape the black hole's reach. Some blocks have unique effects, from blowing up other nearby blocks to spawning a mini black hole! Carefully co-ordinate each move to survive as long as possible.

Can you survive long enough to get a gold time?
